info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 02 at 6:06PM MST until September 02 at 7:30PM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: The National Weather Service in Las Vegas has issued a * Flash Flood Warning for... Western Mohave County in northwestern Arizona... * Until 730 PM MST. * At 606 PM MST, a camera showed flooding of Pierce Ferry Road at Archibald Wash. HAZARD...Life-threatening flash flooding. SOURCE...Trained spotters reported. IMPACT...Life-threatening flash flooding of low-water crossings, creeks, normally dry washes and roads. * Some locations that will experience flash flooding include... Pierce Ferry Road. FLASH FLOOD...OBSERVED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
